name: Platypus DuoLock Soft Bottle 2L
description: Building on the popularity of the SoftBottle, Platypus gives this one a double locking lid and an ergonomic handle that doubles as a carabiner.Rugged polyethylene material is taste and BPA free.DuoLock locking flip-cap keeps grit and debris off the drinking spout, and locks to the bottle itself for leak-proof drinking.Freestanding design.
